description:
Rhydon was the second. Pok√©mon Blaine used in his first battle against Ash.
Rhydon scored the victory over Ash`s Charizard after it flew away and refused to battle. However, Ash decided to use Pikachu who used Rhydon`s horn as a conductor when using Thunderbolt against it.
name: Sidon (Katsura)
